verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> be unto the <S%H7462>pastors<s%> that <S%H6>destroy<s%> and <S%H6327>scatter<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of my <S%H4830>pasture!<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H7462>pastors<s%> that <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H859>Ye<s%> have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and driven them <S%H5080>away,<s%> and have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6485>visited<s%> them: <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of my <S%H6629>flock<s%> out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> them, and will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> their <S%H5116>folds;<s%> and they shall be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>increase.<s%>

And I will set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them which shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> them: and they shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> be <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they be <S%H6485>lacking,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I will <S%H6965>raise<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6780>Branch,<s%> and a <S%H4428>King<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> and <S%H7919>prosper,<s%> and shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>justice<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

In his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall be <S%H3467>saved,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely:<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> he shall be <S%H7121>called,<s%> THE <S%H3068>LORD<s%> OUR <S%H6664>RIGHTEOUSNESS.<s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that they shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

But, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H935>led<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H4480>country,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I had <S%H5080>driven<s%> them; and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> their own <S%H127>land.<s%>

Mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me is <S%H7665>broken<s%> because of the <S%H5030>prophets;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H7363>shake;<s%> I <S%H1961>am<s%> like a <S%H7910>drunken<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and like a <S%H1397>man<s%> whom <S%H3196>wine<s%> hath <S%H5674>overcome,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H6944>holiness.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H5003>adulterers;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H423>swearing<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourneth;<s%> the pleasant <S%H4999>places<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> are dried <S%H3001>up,<s%> and their <S%H4794>course<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and their <S%H1369>force<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3651>right.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> are <S%H2610>profane;<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%> have I <S%H4672>found<s%> their <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H3651><s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto them as <S%H2519>slippery<s%> ways in the <S%H653>darkness:<s%> they shall be driven <S%H1760>on,<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> therein: <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, even the <S%H8141>year<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H8604>folly<s%> in the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%> they <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and <S%H853>caused<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H8582>err.<s%>

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> also in the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a horrible <S%H8186>thing:<s%> they commit <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H8267>lies:<s%> they <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> also the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> that <S%H1115>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> doth <S%H7725>return<s%> from his <S%H4480>wickedness:<s%> <S%H7451><s%> they <S%H1961>are<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them unto me as <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof as <S%H6017>Gomorrah.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H398>feed<s%> them with <S%H3939>wormwood,<s%> and make them <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H7219>gall:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> is <S%H2613>profaneness<s%> gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> into <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H8085>Hearken<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> unto you: they make you <S%H1891>vain:<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H2377>vision<s%> of their own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> out of the <S%H4480>mouth<s%> <S%H6310><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

They say <S%H559>still<s%> <S%H559><s%> unto them that <S%H5006>despise<s%> me, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>said,<s%> Ye shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H7965>peace;<s%> and they <S%H559>say<s%> unto every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> after the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of his own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H5475>counsel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and hath <S%H7200>perceived<s%> and <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1697>word?<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H7181>marked<s%> his <S%H1697>word,<s%> and <S%H8085>heard<s%> it?

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> a <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> in <S%H2534>fury,<s%> even a <S%H2342>grievous<s%> <S%H5591>whirlwind:<s%> it shall fall <S%H2342>grievously<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

The <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>return,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he have <S%H6213>executed,<s%> and <S%H5704>till<s%> he have <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H4209>thoughts<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart:<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> ye shall <S%H995>consider<s%> it <S%H998>perfectly.<s%>

I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> yet <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H7323>ran:<s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> them, yet <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> they had <S%H5975>stood<s%> in my <S%H5475>counsel,<s%> and had <S%H853>caused<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words,<s%> then they should have <S%H7725>turned<s%> them from their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4480>way,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> and from the <S%H4480>evil<s%> <S%H7455><s%> of their <S%H4611>doings.<s%>
Am <S%H589>I<s%> a <S%H430>God<s%> at <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H7138><s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H430>God<s%> afar <S%H4480>off?<s%> <S%H7350><s%>

Can <S%H518><s%> <S%H376>any<s%> hide <S%H5641>himself<s%> in secret <S%H4565>places<s%> that <S%H589>I<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> him? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> Do <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H4390>fill<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth?<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> in my <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I have <S%H2492>dreamed,<s%> I have <S%H2492>dreamed.<s%>

How <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> shall this <S%H3426>be<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>lies?<s%> yea, they are <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of the <S%H8649>deceit<s%> of their own <S%H3820>heart;<s%>

Which <S%H2803>think<s%> to <S%H853>cause<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7911>forget<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> by their <S%H2472>dreams<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H5608>tell<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal.<s%>

The <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H854><s%> hath a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> let him <S%H5608>tell<s%> a <S%H2472>dream;<s%> and he <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H854><s%> hath my <S%H1697>word,<s%> let him <S%H1696>speak<s%> my <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H571>faithfully.<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is the <S%H8401>chaff<s%> <S%H854>to<s%> the <S%H1250>wheat?<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Is <S%H3808>not<s%> my <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H3541>like<s%> as a <S%H784>fire?<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and like a <S%H6360>hammer<s%> that <S%H6327>breaketh<s%> the <S%H5553>rock<s%> in pieces?

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H1589>steal<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H3947>use<s%> their <S%H3956>tongues,<s%> and <S%H5001>say,<s%> He <S%H5002>saith.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am <S%H5921>against<s%> them that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and do <S%H5608>tell<s%> them, and <S%H853>cause<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H8582>err<s%> by their <S%H8267>lies,<s%> and by their <S%H6350>lightness;<s%> yet <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them: therefore they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> profit this people at <S%H3276>all,<s%> <S%H3276><s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H3548>priest,<s%> shall <S%H7592>ask<s%> thee, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> thou shalt then <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>them,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H4853>burden?<s%> I will even <S%H5203>forsake<s%> you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And as for the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I will even <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered?<s%> and, <S%H4100>What<s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoken?<s%>

And the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall ye <S%H2142>mention<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H4853>burden;<s%> for ye have <S%H2015>perverted<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> thee? and, <S%H4100>What<s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoken?<s%>

But <S%H518>since<s%> ye <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> ye <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word,<s%> The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I, even I, will utterly <S%H5382>forget<s%> <S%H5382><s%> you, and I will <S%H5203>forsake<s%> you, and the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> you and your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and cast you out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> my presence: <S%H6440><s%>
